detail_desc: Calf-length dress in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide top with a wide, ribbed seam at the waist, slits at the sides of the hem, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with print motifs. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and two-way zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, concealed side pockets and an inner pocket. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit, patterned cotton with a sewn-on bow at the neckline and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif at the top. Seam at the hips and a lined, flared skirt in two layers of tulle, the top layer with glittery spots.

Calf-length dress in soft twill made from a linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, buttons down the front and pleats at the back of the waist. Flap front pockets with a button, long dolman sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable, adjustable belt at the waist with a fabric-covered buckle.
Sleeveless, circular dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a decorative bow at the front and gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.

Boxy-style jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Knee-length skirt in sturdy twill made from a wool blend. Regular waist, zip fly and buttons, large patch front pockets, welt back pockets, and a slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
Metal and plastic hair clips in various sizes and designs decorated with polished stones and pearly plastic beads. Length 6-8 cm.
Hair set in metal with five hair clips and two hair claws in various designs. Length from 6 cm to 9 cm.
Trousers in soft leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems. Viscose twill lining at the top.
Trousers in soft leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems. Viscose twill lining at the top.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbows, and a smocked seam at the waist.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline and short sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. Set in soft, jacquard-knit wool. Jumper with buttons at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a lace trim at the hem.

Jumper in a soft knit with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Short coat in woven fabric with a patterned lining. Wrapover front with draped lapels and a concealed press-stud, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with narrow notch lapels and a wrapover front with ties inside. Long sleeves with decorative, covered buttons at the cuffs and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with a covered metal buckle. Lined.

Fully lined, ribbed swimsuit with a fixed belt to accentuate the waist. Square neckline at the front and a deeper square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Two-tone leather boots with square toes and a high shaft with a seam at the back and concealed zip in one side. Leather linings, insoles and soles. Heel approx. 7 cm.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover at the front of the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

V-neck cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and buttons down the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Fancy dress costume in jersey with a matching mask. Costume with a padded chest and shoulders, a hook and loop fastening at the back, and a detachable, padded tail.
Long-sleeved top in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a back section in woven fabric. Jersey-lined front.
